name: Swan Queen marriage Tumblr dashboard
description: Tumblr dashboard theme featuring artwork from Marynesq (used with permission). All of her art can be found at MaryneArt , and the rest of the art from this set can be found on this tumblr post . Feel free to leave any comments/suggestions either in the discussion below or my Tumblr askbox .
additional_info: I realize that there are a few small problems with this, but they are both pretty minor and I wanted to get this out there.  I will have those problems fixed within the week.  Happy scrolling!
